author: cara tamburich

review: This is awesome! I haven't had any issues with it so far. I did struggle to open the remote backing but got through it! Ha. The only thing is I wish you can add other TV viewing apps like NBC or ABC so I can catch up on shows that way! But we have a Netflix account and everything was so simple to connect to. I have a Wii and connecting to Netflix is a 30 minute process and even longer when the wireless connection is "weak." But with the stick it surprised me how easy it was! And I love how easy it is to go from one TV to the next. Great job Amazon!
author: Amazon Customer
